Package org.fridlund.backman.entities

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    SpecialAction
    Used as a simple ActionListener (without event information).
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Backman  
    Ghost
    Simple ghost AI, Chooses a random direction of the ones accessible (except the one from it came), when it collides with a wall.
    GhostGraphics
    Contains the animation for the Ghost entity.
    Snack
    The default yellow snacks that Pacman eats.
    SpecialSnack
    A place holder for the special action command.
    SuperSnack  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Direction
    Simple enum used when choosing the animation, based on the moving direction.
